cookies_descr: This website uses cookies: we store your session and settings locally to enhance your user experience
create_room_descr_1: In a separate room you can gather your players and have your own dice roller with a dice log separate from the public rolls.
create_room_descr_2: You can set up a password for your room to make sure it's private and protected.
create_room_descr_3: Choose "Protect roll result links" if you want the links of the roll results be also protected by the password.
no_connection: No connection to the server. Please try to realod the page
